title: I've found the perfect word to describe what's wrong with league
body:
Arcade-y. That's what it really is. Arcade-y. Engagements don't last long enough, cheap tactics are favoured over clever strategy. It's like a top-down class-based First Person Shooter, except every time you die to something cheap, you get weaker and weaker.

Look at this beauty

https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-creations-en/lsvbOTiB-the-golden-age

replies.body: How can you say you've found the perfect word when it's not even a word?

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qisBo5T0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-05-10T23:10:12.956+0000)
>
> How can you say you've found the perfect word when it's not even a word?

Lmfao
Turning the Diablo series into a shooter is what ruined it. So yeah, I see it to.
